text: (napiyē!) Allāhviṉ (mēlāṉa) takutikkut takkavāṟu avaṉai avarkaḷ kaṇṇiyappaṭuttuvatillai. Pūmi (ivvaḷavu peritāka irunta pōtilum atu) muḻuvatum maṟumaiyil avaṉuṭaiya oru kaippiṭiyil irukkum. Mēlum, vāṉaṅkaḷ aṉaittum curuṭṭappaṭṭu avaṉuṭaiya valatu kaiyil irukkum. Ivarkaḷ iṇaivaippatai viṭṭu avaṉ mika mēlāṉavaṉ; avaṉ mika paricuttamāṉavaṉ
